title: The Long wait
creator_credit: Maxwell Munden and St John Ambulance (UK)
brief_description: First-aid can save lives. Illustrates the importance of learning the elements of first aid as it follows two days in the life of Bill Jason, the “little man” to whom everything happens. Pointing its moral simply, the film sets out several important principles of first aid.
